entry.title: Small update to BIP 62
entry.summary: In a discussion about new signatures by the sender, Aaron Voisine suggested a possible solution to mitigate this issue by requiring all signatures to deterministically generate k per RFC6979. However, it was met with a response of "nope" and Voisine was tasked with explaining why this wouldn't work. It is unclear what specific issue or problem they were trying to address with this suggestion.
